title: Fix issues with Windows 7 & 10 CPU build
body_html:
This addresses #494.

This diff includes multiple fixes and workarounds to make the current master build and pass tests on Windows 7 & 10 without CUDA. We will be putting up official Windows CI as soon as possible and it will make it easier to maintain Windows compatibility.

All credit goes to @peterjc123 who have been spending a lot of effort maintaining the Windows build for a long time.

body:
This addresses https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/494.

This diff includes multiple fixes and workarounds to make the current master build and pass tests on Windows 7 & 10 without CUDA. We will be putting up official Windows CI as soon as possible and it will make it easier to maintain Windows compatibility.

All credit goes to @peterjc123 who have been spending a lot of effort maintaining the Windows build for a long time.
